title: Pizzo Muncréch
text: Pizzo Muncréch is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> in the Swiss <a href="Lepontine%20Alps">Lepontine Alps</a>, overlooking <a href="Malvaglia">Malvaglia</a> in the canton of <a href="Ticino">Ticino</a>. It is located west of <a href="Piz%20di%20Strega">Piz di Strega</a>, between the valleys of Combra and Pontirone.
